Team","details":"Atomically splits payments: 99.5% to freelancer, 0.5% to platform  Security Features: - ReentrancyGuard: Prevents reentrancy attacks - Pausable: Emergency circuit breaker - SafeERC20: Safe token transfers (handles non-standard tokens) - Ownable: Access control for admin functions - Input validation: All parameters validated - No delegatecall: Contract does not use delegatecall - No external calls before state changes: CEI pattern followed","errors":{"EnforcedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is paused."}],"ExpectedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is not paused."}],"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)"}],"OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address)":[{"details":"The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation."}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token failed."}]},"events":{"Paused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`."},"Unpaused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`."}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"calculateFeeSplit(uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"Total payment amount"},"returns":{"freelancerAmount":"Amount the freelancer receives (99.5%)","platformFee":"Amount the platform receives (0.5%)"}},"constructor":{"params":{"_platformWallet":"Address to receive platform fees"}},"emergencyWithdraw(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Only for recovering stuck tokens, not for normal operation","params":{"amount":"Amount to withdraw","to":"Recipient address","token":"Token address to withdraw"}},"isTokenAllowed(address)":{"params":{"token":"Token address to check"},"returns":{"_0":"bool True if token is allowed or whitelist is disabled"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"pause()":{"details":"Prevents all payments while paused"},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"pay(address,uint256,address,string)":{"details":"Uses CEI (Checks-Effects-Interactions) pattern for security","params":{"amount":"Total payment amount (must be >= MIN_PAYMENT_AMOUNT)","freelancer":"Recipient address (gets 99.5%)","invoiceId":"Reference ID for the payment (for off-chain tracking)","token":"ERC20 token address for payment"}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. emergencyWithdraw(address,address,uint25.details: Only for recovering stuck tokens, not for normal operation

returns._0: bool True if token is allowed or whitelist is disabled

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.invoiceId: Reference ID for the payment (for off-chain tracking)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.newWallet: New address to receive platform fees

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

MIN_PAYMENT_AMOUNT().notice: Minimum payment amount to prevent dust attacks

allowedTokens(address).notice: Mapping of whitelisted tokens (optional security measure)

calculateFeeSplit(uint256).notice: Calculate fee split for a given amount

isTokenAllowed(address).notice: Check if a token is allowed (when whitelist is enabled)

pay(address,uint256,address,string).notice: Process a payment with automatic 0.5% fee split

platformWallet().notice: Platform wallet that receives the 0.5% fee

setTokenAllowed(address,bool).notice: Add or remove a token from the whitelist

setWhitelistEnabled(bool).notice: Enable or disable token whitelist enforcement
